title: is anyone having ptoblems opening their league client?
body: so i open my client and the symbol comes up to open then nothing happends i have uninstalled and turned my computer off several times and still the client dosen't work anyone know why?

replies.body: I also have this problem and have launched a ticket. Rito pls
Same here. I think it's got something to do with the activation of Rek'Sai. I suggest sending in a support ticket though, only a few select people are getting this problem at the moment.
